cast.overview: A private eye investigates the apparent suicide of a fading porn star in 1970s Los Angeles and uncovers a conspiracy.
cast.title: The Nice Guys

details.biography: John L. Morris is a former Casino Dealer and Supervisor now living outside of Atlanta, GA. He is a father of one. Morris is an avid poker player and has a victory on the World Series of Poker Circuit in Pot Limit Omaha. He has worked on several films, television shows, and commercials after leaving his casino career. He graduated from the University of Notre Dame in 2002 with a B.S. in Science-Preprofessional Studies.
details.name: John L. Morris
